item.title: First blog post
item.description: The beginning is here - Nothing to see here yet, there is more to come tho!

item.title: New ways of connecting
item.description: The future is now old man! Iâ€™ve had multiple accounts in just 10 years. Scattered all across the internet: Mastodon, X, Facebook, Google, YouTube, Instagram, Snapchat, etc. With multiple names, nicknames, my own IRL name, and profile pictures. Some of the time I followed content creators, other times politics, etc....
